title: Top 5 Finalist - 36-Hour Hackathon
subtitle: SynHack Hackathon - VNIT Nagpur
description: Member of a 4-person team in a 36-hour hackathon where we designed and developed a Study Material Management System. Ranked among the Top 5 teams out of 17 working on the same problem statement. Gained hands-on experience in teamwork, problem-solving, rapid prototyping, and collaborative development under time constraints.

title: Second Prize - Poster Making Competition
subtitle: 15th August Programme - VNIT Nagpur
description: Secured Second Prize in a poster making competition organized as part of the 15th August (Independence Day) programme at VNIT Nagpur. The poster focused on patriotic and national themes and was recognized for creativity and visual impact. Received the award and was honoured by the Chairman of VNIT Nagpur, Shri Madabhushi Madan Gopal, IAS (Retd.).
